::Striker::

Striker looks from Spears to the indents her fingers had left on the seat. He 
chuckles.

"Don't worry about it, we all have our fears," he says, looking at the seat. 
He takes out a pistol, shooting the arms off of the chair.

"There, now no one will find out," he says, putting the pistol away, "Let's 
go."

He starts to walk, and stops when an idea occurs to him. "It would be faster 
if I fly you there, but I think you would prefer to walk?"
